goals.complete: I met Eir at the summit of a great mountain and with her help, I defeated the fearsome griffon Windshear. I've bathed the axe in its blood, as requested. Now to return the weapon to Beigarth and he'll temper it a final time.

I bathed the axe in Windshear's blood and returned it to Beigarth. He was impressed and told me he would finish work on it at once, then send it along with Eir when we set off to take down Korag. I can hardly wait to wield it.
